text: Get Lectured continues with a look at the events in store this semester for the Sam Fox School of Design & Visual Arts at Washington University in St. Louis. Kicking off the Spring are lectures from FORMA’s Miroslava Brooks and Daniel Markiewicz (January 24); Alfonso Garduño (January 27); artist Blas Isasi (January 30); Jane Hutton (February 3); and author/illustrator Carson Ellis (February 6). Eric Höweler of Höweler + Yoon visits campus next for a lecture on February 14. His appearance will be followed by a February 21 panel discussion related to the exhibition 'Seeds: Containers of a World to Come' at the Kemper Art Museum and a lecture from Janette Kim on February 24. Painter EJ Hauser (March 17); Beatriz Cortez (March 26); and RMA Architects founding principal Rahul Mehrotra (April 14) follow her to conclude the term. Want to share your school's lecture series? html:
Get Lectured continues with a look at the events in store this semester for the Sam Fox School of Design & Visual Arts at Washington University in St. Louis.

Kicking off the Spring are lectures from FORMA’s Miroslava Brooks and Daniel Markiewicz (January 24); Alfonso Garduño (January 27); artist Blas Isasi (January 30); Jane Hutton (February 3); and author/illustrator Carson Ellis (February 6).

Eric Höweler of Höweler + Yoon visits campus next for a lecture on February 14. His appearance will be followed by a February 21 panel discussion related to the exhibition 'Seeds: Containers of a World to Come' at the Kemper Art Museum and a lecture from Janette Kim on February 24. Painter EJ Hauser (March 17); Beatriz Cortez (March 26); and RMA Architects founding principal Rahul Mehrotra (April 14) follow her to conclude the term.

Want to share your school's lecture series? Send us your poster and details to connect@archinect.com.
